name: Space Shooter (itch) (David Tan)
description:
Programming Language Used: C#

Game Engine Used: Unity

Team Size: Solo

Role: Designer/Programmer

  • Programmed player controller and enemy path following. 
  • Designed and implemented power-up system.
  • Implemented a final boss enemy with an unique projectile attack as well as a state machine to control boss states. 

Controls:

  • "W" to move up
  • "S" to move down
  • "A" to move left
  • "D" to move right
  • Space to shoot
